short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline sharing of CRM contacts with partners directly from Hubspot or Pipedrive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShareThisLead enhances CRM collaboration by enabling users to share contacts effortlessly between HubSpot and Pipedrive. With just one click, streamline your lead-sharing process. Our intuitive extension adds intuitive buttons directly in your CRM interface, enabling lead sharing and importing in a few clicks. Install ShareThisLead to simplify CRM workflows, boost productivity, and foster partner ecosystem growth.
